Navigating Healthcare Enrollment: Avoiding Common Pitfalls Under the Affordable Care Act
By Marissa Schwartz|Monday, November 6, 2023
When it comes to signing up for healthcare under the Affordable Care Act (ACA), its crucial to avoid potential pitfalls and make informed decisions. To help you navigate this process effectively, weve compiled a list of the five most common mistakes people make when enrolling for healthcare under the ACA. By being aware of these missteps, you can ensure you make the most of the options available to you and secure the coverage you need.
